context: Dubai is one of the seven Emirates in UAE which is located on the Persian Gulf, towards the southeast of the Arabic Peninsula. UAE has seven emirates: Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Ajman, Fujairah, Sharjah, Ras al Khaimah, and Umm al Quwain. Dubai is the most popular city in UAE and has the highest population as well. Arabic is the main language spoken in Dubai, and the currency used is UAE dirham (AED). Dubai has a dry sub-tropical climate; the summers are really hot and humid, while the winters are pleasant. Dubai is a big city with many districts, including Jumeirah, Downtown Dubai, Deira, Mirdiff, Karama, Satwa, Dubai Marina, Bur Dubai, International City, and Jebel Ali. Dubai has gained popularity for its tourism in recent years. Each year, millions of visitors visit Dubai and contribute majorly to its tourism industry. Dubai is famous for its best infrastructure on the planet. It has numerous sky

context:
Best Places in Dubai: Our Top Suggestions for the Interested Seasoned Traveler

Forget the usual perception about Dubai as hot, desert-like, and boring. The new Dubai is a tourist haven ready to serve all kinds of travelers and tourists with different needs and preferences. In fact, in this city called one of the emirates, it was tallied as the 7th most visited city globally. So, is it time to join the fun and adventure? Here are the best places in Dubai that are worth your visit and time:

1. Dubai Autodrome: This is a motor sports complex that features a racing and sporting track.

2. Dubai Fountains: Water fountains that shoot up to as high as 500 feet and are complemented by music.

3. Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve: A national and protective park in Dubai.

4. Sheikh Mohammed Centre for Cultural Understanding (SMCCU): Learn the local culture and customs of the city at this complex.

5. Dolphin Bay: Discover a thriving dolphin habitat in Dubai.

6. Burj Khalifa: This is a must-see in Dubai, considered the tallest building in the world right now.

7. The Tower of Arabs: Another tall building in Dubai worth a visit.

8. Skydive Dubai: This is best for adventure seekers.

9. Dubai Beaches: The beaches that line up Jumeirah Road are worth visiting.

10. The World Islands: Located 4 km off the coast of Dubai, this is a representation of the world map in the form of small islands.

...
